TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionAsInputOfJavaFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b) + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[+(asyncFunc1($0, $1), 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[(f0 + 1) AS EXPR$0]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionInWhereClauseOnly
TestCase.Resource: SELECT a, b FROM MyTable WHERE asyncFunc1(a, c) > 0
LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(asyncFunc1($0, $2), 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[a, b], where=[(f0 > 0)]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[a, b, asyncFunc1(a, c) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionMixedWithJavaFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), c + 1 FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
Calc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, (c + 1) AS EXPR$1]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionMixedWithSyncPythonFunction
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), pyFunc1(b, c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[pyFunc1($1, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

PythonCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, pyFunc1(b, c) AS EXPR$1]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[b, c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionOnly
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
PythonAsyncCalc(select=[asyncFunc1(a, b) AS EXPR$0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testAsyncPythonFunctionWithWhereClause
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), c FROM MyTable WHERE asyncFunc2(a, c) > 0
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], c=[$2]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(asyncFunc2($0, $2), 0)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

Calc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, c]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- Calc(select=[a, b, c], where=[(f0 > 0)]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[a, b, c, asyncFunc2(a, c) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testChainingAsyncPythonFunctions
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc2(asyncFunc1(a, b), c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc2(asyncFunc1($0, $1), $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])
PythonAsyncCalc(select=[asyncFunc2(f0, c) AS EXPR$0]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])

TestCase.name: testMultipleAsyncPythonFunctions
TestCase.Resource: SELECT asyncFunc1(a, b), asyncFunc2(b, c) FROM MyTable
LogicalProject(EXPR$0=[asyncFunc1($0, $1)], EXPR$1=[asyncFunc2($1, $2)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]])

PythonAsyncCalc(select=[f0 AS EXPR$0, asyncFunc2(b, c) AS EXPR$1]) +- PythonAsyncCalc(select=[b, c, asyncFunc1(a, b) AS f0]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, MyTable]], fields=[a, b, c])
